mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kfashion_label ( work_no, work_step, no, rect_no, poly_no, category_no, category_item_no, created_id, created_datetime, updated_datetime ) VALUES ( #{workNo}, #{workStep}, #{no}, #{rectNo}, #{polyNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{categoryItemNo}, #{createdId}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO kfashion_label ( work_no, work_step, no, rect_no, poly_no, category_no, category_item_no, created_id, created_datetime, updated_datetime ) VALUES ( #{workNo}, #{workStep}, #{no}, #{rectNo}, #{polyNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{categoryItemNo}, #{createdId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, kfashion_work.work_name, kfashion_work_history.created_id, kfashion_work_history.created_datetime FROM kfashion_image LEFT JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no RIGHT JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work.work_state = 3 GROUP BY kfashion_image.work_no
